title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4217.16 - Additional authorized wagers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4217.16 - Additional authorized wagers

State Regulations

In addition to the types of wagers authorized by this
part, an association or corporation may, with the prior permission of the
board, offer any type of pari-mutuel wagering as defined by Chapter 9, Pari-Mutuel Wagering, Uniform Rules of Racing, as adopted and published in

December, 1996, by the Association of Racing Commissioners, International at
2343 Alexandria Drive, Suite 200, Lexington, Kentucky 40504-3276. This is
available for public inspection at the New York State Gaming Commission located
at 354 Broadway, Schenectady, NY 12305, and at the Department of State, 99

Washington Avenue, Albany, New York 12231. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4217.16

Amended

New

York State Register July 10, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 28, eff. 7/10/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
